metadata.name: È Stata Colpa Mia
metadata.description:
"You know, the fault is never your own and yet he felt so strange. It was the first time he had ever felt this sensation. He couldn't handle it."

"Si sa, la colpa non è mai la propria eppure si sentiva così strano. Era la prima volta che provava questa sensazione. Non sapeva gestirla."

2880x1226px

Together with the nft the owner will receive the Verisart certificate of authenticity, which assures that the work is original and created by me.
The copyright remains with me as its creator. Merchandising is not possible. It is possible to exhibit it in galleries and exhibitions, schools, private groups or for personal use.
